page.title: 03BARNHAM 1
page.content:
Mrs Barsby has lived in Barnham since 1966, 19 years. She has always lived in the same house which is along the main road, Barnham. She ahs seen many changes in Barnham over the years, for example the main shopping area and nearby estate were once a nursery. Sperrings supermarket is now on the site occupied by a large red-bricked house which used to be the nursey offices.The station was built in Barnham, a junction for lines from Brighton, London, Littlehampton and Bognor. Mrs Barsby has noticed some favourable changes: There are more shops, youth organisations, the Post Office has changed location.
By Elizabeth Binns and Louise Dodd.
